author: stoddard
msg: Enable mod_mem_cache to use apr_atomic operators in managing cache_object
reference counting. Enabled by default via the USE_ATOMICS preproc directive.
This compiles cleanly and serves pages on Windows. Not compiled or tested on

msg: - pass the ptemp (temporary pool) so we don't need to create a subpool

msg: cleanup tmp key callbacks.  each had assigned the same (1024 bit) value
